_comment: Hello {{_globals._learnerInfo.firstname}}, welcome to the ID 6 week challenge. Where do you want to start? Choose your path:

title: MCQ
body: Which of the following options would you consider to be correct?

_items.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit.
Donec nec justo neque id cursus faucibus.
Nunc dignissim egestas placerat.
